section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by temporary legislation that will expire on August 5, 2021.*
section.heading: Certificate of assurance moratorium.
section.text: Notwithstanding the requirements of § 42-3502.21, no owner of a housing accommodation shall request a certificate of assurance for one year beginning on November 4, 2020, and the Mayor shall not issue a certificate of assurance for any request received for one year beginning on November 4, 2020.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of, see § 2 of Certificate of Assurance Moratorium Emergency Amendment Act of 2020 (D.C. Act 23-454, Nov. 4, 2020, 67 DCR 13216).
For temporary (225 days) creation of this section, see § 2 of Certificate of Assurance Moratorium Temporary Amendment Act of 2020 (D.C. Law 23-173, Dec. 23, 2020, 67 DCR 13228).
